hansen 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Card, Mas, and Rothstein (2008) Segregation Dynamics Dataset

    cmr2008.Rd

    Demographic, economic, and housing characteristics across U.S. census tracts from 1970 to 2000. The dataset includes variables related to population composition, income, housing, and transportation, reorganized from the original replication files.

    cmr2008

    Format

    A data frame with 48,643 observations (census tracts) and 46 variables.

    geo2000

    Census tract code

    unem_70

    Unemployment rate for population 16+ years, 1970

    unem_80

    Unemployment rate for population 16+ years, 1980

    unem_90

    Unemployment rate for population 16+ years, 1990

    unem_00

    Unemployment rate for population 16+ years, 2000

    msa

    Metropolitan Statistical Area (MSA) code

    city

    Name of the Metropolitan Statistical Area (MSA)

    pubtran_70

    Fraction of workers using public transportation, 1970

    pubtran_80

    Fraction of workers using public transportation, 1980

    pubtran_90

    Fraction of workers using public transportation, 1990

    pop_70

    Population, 1970

    pop_80

    Population, 1980

    pop_90

    Population, 1990

    pop_00

    Population, 2000

    fr_white_70

    Fraction White, 1970

    fr_white_80

    Fraction White, 1980

    fr_white_90

    Fraction White, 1990

    fr_white_00

    Fraction White, 2000

    fr_min_70

    Fraction Minority, 1970

    fr_min_80

    Fraction Minority, 1980

    fr_min_90

    Fraction Minority, 1990

    fr_min_00

    Fraction Minority, 2000

    chg_white_7080

    Change in White share, 1970-1980

    chg_white_8090

    Change in White share, 1980-1990

    chg_white_9000

    Change in White share, 1990-2000

    chg_min_7080

    Change in Minority share, 1970-1980

    chg_min_8090

    Change in Minority share, 1980-1990

    chg_min_9000

    Change in Minority share, 1990-2000

    chg_pop_7080

    Change in population, 1970-1980

    chg_pop_8090

    Change in population, 1980-1990

    chg_pop_9000

    Change in population, 1990-2000

    samp_70

    Indicator for inclusion in 1970 sample

    samp_80

    Indicator for inclusion in 1980 sample

    samp_90

    Indicator for inclusion in 1990 sample

    faminc_70

    Log of mean family income, 1970

    faminc_80

    Log of mean family income, 1980

    faminc_90

    Log of mean family income, 1990

    vac_70

    Fraction of vacant homes, 1970

    vac_80

    Fraction of vacant homes, 1980

    vac_90

    Fraction of vacant homes, 1990

    rent_70

    Fraction of renter-occupied homes, 1970

    rent_80

    Fraction of renter-occupied homes, 1980

    rent_90

    Fraction of renter-occupied homes, 1990

    oneunit_70

    Fraction of single-unit homes, 1970

    oneunit_80

    Fraction of single-unit homes, 1980

    oneunit_90

    Fraction of single-unit homes, 1990

    Source

    Card, D., Mas, A., & Rothstein, J. (2008). "Tipping and the Dynamics of Segregation." Quarterly Journal of Economics. Data available at https://berkeley.app.box.com/v/tippingreplication
